name: duskily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
with a soft or low light, not brightly: The dying embers of the fire glowed low and duskily. The lamp now burned dimly and duskily so that the people were just shadows. Related word
dusky
More examplesFewer examplesThe statue glowed duskily in the late afternoon sun.The comet was burning duskily through a veil of cloud. The room was duskily lit by two small windows.A light shone duskily through the dark green of the forest.Night was falling, and twilight came duskily through the windows.
